description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. In a far off, dystopian world, there are two kinds of humans: the Unlimited who possess free will and the limited who do not. KANA is a young, limited girl who one day has broken away from her servitude programming and has stolen a rocket pack. She sets off to kill the Empress.
description.short: In a far off, dystopian world, there are two kinds of humans: the Unlimited who possess free will and the limited who do not. KANA is a young, limited girl who one day has broken away from her servitude programming and has stolen a rocket pack. She sets off to kill the Empress.
